mapper.select: SELECT M.SDEPT_CODE, C.GRADUATION_NAME, M.GRADUATION_CHECK, M.GRADUATION_INFO FROM GRADURATION_MANAGE M LEFT JOIN GRADURATION_CRITERIA C ON(M.GRADUATION_CODE=C.GRADUATION_CODE) WHERE STUDENT_NO=#{studentNo}
SELECT SDEPT_CODE, GRADUATION_NAME, GRADUATION_CONTENT, GRADUATION_CODE FROM GRADURATION_CRITERIA WHERE SDEPT_CODE='SD100'

SELECT G.SDEPT_CODE, G.GRADUATION_NAME, G.GRADUATION_CONTENT, G.GRADUATION_CODE, S.SDEPT_NAME, C.COLLEGE_NAME FROM GRADURATION_CRITERIA G LEFT JOIN SDEPARTMENT S ON(G.SDEPT_CODE=S.SDEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN COLLEGE C ON(S.COLLEGE_CODE=C.COLLEGE_CODE) WHERE G.SDEPT_CODE !='SD100'

SELECT G.SDEPT_CODE, G.GRADUATION_NAME, G.GRADUATION_CONTENT, G.GRADUATION_CODE, S.SDEPT_NAME FROM GRADURATION_CRITERIA G LEFT JOIN SDEPARTMENT S ON(G.SDEPT_CODE=S.SDEPT_CODE) WHERE GRADUATION_CODE=#{graduationCode}
